is-defined: {{each}} {{property}} should not be null or undefined
is-in: {{each}} {{property}} must be one of the following values: {{constraints.0}}
is-not-in: {{each}} {{property}} should not be one of the following values: {{constraints.0}}
validate-nested: {{each}} {{property}} must be either object or array
is-instance: {{property}} is not instance of the specified object
is-not-empty-object: {{property}} should not be an empty object
is-alpha-numeric: {{each}} {{property}} must contain only letters and numbers
is-bic: {{each}} {{property}} must be a BIC or SWIFT code
is-byte-length: {{each}} {{property}} byte length must fall into ({{constraints.0}} - {{constraints.1}}) range
is-data-uri: {{each}} {{property}} must be a data uri format
is-date-string: {{each}} {{property}} must be a valid ISO 8601 date string
is-decimal: {{each}} {{property}} is not a valid decimal number.
is-ean: {{each}} {{property}} must be an EAN (European Article Number)
is-firebase-push-id: {{each}} {{property}} must be a Firebase Push Id
is-fqdn: {{each}} {{property}} must be a valid domain name
is-hash: {{each}} {{property}} must be a hash of type {{constraints.0}}
is-lower-case: {{each}} {{property}} must be a lower case string
is-military-time: {{each}} {{property}} must be a valid representation of military time in the format HH:MM
is-multi-byte: {{each}} {{property}} must contain one or more multibyte chars
is-phone-number: {{each}} {{property}} must be a valid phone number
is-sem-ver: {{each}} {{property}} must be a Semantic Versioning Specification
is-surrogate-pair: {{each}} {{property}} must contain any surrogate pairs chars
is-variable-width: {{each}} {{property}} must contain a full-width and half-width characters
length: {{each}} {{property}} doesn't length falls in a range ({{min}} - {{max}})
max-length: {{each}} {{property}} must be shorter than or equal to {{constraints.0}} characters
min-length: {{each}} {{property}} must be higher than or equal to {{constraints.0}} characters
is-enum: {{each}} {{property}} must be a valid enum value
is-number: {{each}} {{property}} must be a number conforming to the specified constraints

company-register.file-type-error: Please upload your document as a pdf.

step2.title: Upload your business license so we can quickly check it

account-user-limit-modal.title: Representative Minimum
account-user-limit-modal.text: Add at least two representatives as your company has joint representation

step7.description1: Click ‘submit’ to send your information to our factoring partner Walbing.
step7.description2: We will check the documents right away and let you know when we’re done.
step7.description3: In the meantime, please check your email. We sent you an email with a link for a quick ID verification.
step7.title: Submit your information
step7.paragraph2: Thank you for entering your company data.
step7.paragraph4: 1. You will receive an email from our partner Walbing with a link to our video identification. For this you will need:
step7.paragraph5: A computer, a tablet or smartphone with camera and microphone as well as a current browser
step7.paragraph6: Your valid identity card or passport
step7.paragraph7: The verification doesn’t take longer than 5 minutes and can be done anytime and anywhere
step7.paragraph8: 2. We will then fully verify and set up your account. This takes less than 2 hours normally, we will let you know as soon as it is done.
step7.paragraph9: 3. After your account is fully set up, you will get an email from our partner Walbing explaining the text snippet you need to put on your invoices to use our services.
step7.paragraph10: For any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

step6.title: Beneficial owners
step6.description1: The benefical owners of your company include any natural person who
step6.description2: (1) directly or indirectly holds more than 25% of the capital shares directly or indirectly controls more than 25% of the voting rights at any inital level of participation, or
step6.description3: (2) indirectly exercises control over more than 25% of the capital or voting rights from a higher level of ownership (Section 3 GwG). Indirect control is to be understood in particular in terms of controlling influence in accordance with Section 290 HGB (including majority of voting rights)

step5.delete-modal-description: Are you sure you want to delete this representative? All entered information will be lost.
step5.title: Legal representatives
step5.subtitle: Please name one representative if they have sole power of representation or list up to three more if they are only authorized to act together with other legal representatives.
step5.tooltip-text-v2: You cannot have more than one representative if your company has sole power of representation. Go back to change to joint power, if applicable.
step5.tooltip-text: A fifth representative cannot be added

step3.checkbox-label-1: By placing a tick mark, you allow direct debit authorization for fees
step3.checkbox-label-3: You declare that you have read the Privacy Policy and the Cookie Policy and agree to these as authorized representative.
step3.checkbox-label-4: You declare that, as an authorized representative of your company, you agree that Walbing may collect data from credit reporting agencies for the purpose of fulfilling its obligations under anti-money-laundering law and share this data, as well as the relevant information provided by your company on a later stage, with the marketplace participants.
step3.title: We need your bank account details in order to pay you faster

step1.title: We need your business data in order to provide our services

step4.title: Legal representatives
step4.subtitle: Using Walbing requires the consent of a legal representative of your company. You as well as all other named representatives will have to do a video confirmation.

question2.description: *Does your company have sole power of representation or do legal representatives only act together with other legal representatives?

user-authorization.title: User Authorization
user-authorization.summary: Fast and secure user authorization and authentication for your application.

sub-feature_one.description: Registration, including double-opt-in and password reset.

sub-feature_two.description: Registration with Single-sign-on (SSO) via Google, LinkedIn or Apple.

sub-feature_three.description: User login and logout with or without Single-sign-on (SSO).

user-management.title: User Management
user-management.summary: Manage your users and let them manage their profiles and settings complying with GDPR rules.

sub-feature_two.description: Explore user profile management, including Avatar upload and & Set New Password feature.

localization.title: Localization
localization.summary: Offer your users 1 or more languages in your application.

sub-feature_one.description: We support full translation of whole page content including errors with single click of the button. Click on the language switch between 🇺🇸 and 🇩🇪 in User Settings page.

sub-feature_two.description: Date and time formats are also changing according to the selected locale.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.summary: Your users receive important notifications in-app or via email.

sub-feature_one.description: Explore in-app notifications about new files or registered users by clicking on bell 🔔 in the header.

sub-feature_two.description: Explore email notifications about files or user activity by getting an email sent from the ROQ application.

sub-feature_three.description: Fine-tune your notification preferences. Users can control which notifications they want to receive and via which channel (in-app or email) in the User Settings.

file-management.title: File Management
file-management.summary: Upload, download, delete any kind of file in your application including pdf, jpeg, txt.

sub-feature_one.description: Upload, download or delete single or multiple files via ROQ One. You might want to define allowed file types and upload size limits.

sub-feature_two.description: Edit your file names, keep your files private or make them public.

sub-feature_three.description: You files are safe and secure. We are using Google Cloud Storage to make it work!

chat.title: Chat
chat.summary: Start a conversation with a ROQ One user or a group.

sub-feature_one.description: Start a 1:1 conversation with any user of your ROQ One application.

sub-feature_three.description: Manage group conversations by renaming, archiving, adding, or removing users

mail.title: Mail
mail.summary: Customers need to use their own SendGrid account.

sub-feature_one.description: User-related emails (registration, password reset, notification, uploaded files) are sent via 3rd party provider SendGrid.

sub-feature_two.description: Customers need to use their own SendGrid account.

user-interface.title: User Interface
user-interface.summary: Modern and fast UI based on world’s most used UI Library - Material UI.

sub-feature_one.description: Fully customize look and feel of your application according to your brand identity. You can start with fonts, colors and different MUI components.
